item.title: Comment on Hong Kong security law revealed – violators may face life imprisonment by HK Catholic activists arrested, US lawmakers sanctioned in China crackdown – NEW EXPRESS NEWS
item.dc:creator: HK Catholic activists arrested, US lawmakers sanctioned in China crackdown – NEW EXPRESS NEWS
item.description: […] will receive a minimum of 10 years in prison, with the possibility of a life sentence. The law’s broad definition of terrorism includes arson and vandalizing public transportation “with an intent to intimidate […]

item.title: Comment on LIVE: WWII ‘Victory Day’ marked with military parade in Beijing by China shows off 'aircraft carrier-killer' missiles at parade as Xi announces troop cuts in the name of peace | Hong Kong Free Press
